basics.name: Stephen L Boettcher
basics.label: Linux & Systems Engineer / Technical Professional
res_summary: Technical professional with deep experience in Linux systems, hardware integration, and software development. Over a decade of experience developing enterprise backup solutions, working directly with tape drives, tape libraries, and SCSI interfaces to control devices via software.
Proficient with Linux command line tools, Docker, Git, and system-level scripting, bridging the gap between hardware, software, and client-facing technical solutions.
Experienced in translating complex technical systems into actionable workflows, mentoring teams, and delivering robust solutions that integrate hardware and software components.
Developed and maintained large-scale web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, integrating with Node and PHP backends to deliver performant, responsive user experiences.
